description: Presidential candidates attended church services, convened campaign rallies and rode their buses â€” and even a fire truck.
title: A Sunday on the Trail
title_page: A Sunday on the Trail - The New York Times
text:
A feathered hat greeted John Edwards at Mount Zion Missionary Baptist Church in Sumter, S.C., on Sunday. Several presidential candidates spent the morning speaking at church services.
Damon Winter/The New York Times
